name: Straight Strike
description:
Straight Strike is a VR game about working in a bowling alley and the everyday interactions between employees and customers. The game’s purpose is to explore the effect that certain communication and language, specifically Heteronormative and Homophobic language, can have on a person.

*NOTE: FINAL BUILD DOES NOT WORK AT POINT CUSTOMER 5, HOWEVER IT DOES WORK IN THE EDIT. FIX COMING SOON.*
